name: CentEDI Catalog Extension
author: CentEDI

sections.description:
The main goal of CentEDI extension is to provide a simple way to create & fill products with correct, filterable and complete details.
Let’s imagine you have a large store with tens of categories and thousands of products. With CentEDI extension you can import the products data almost for free in no time, it saves you time and resources. The process is easy and fast, import a list of products codes from a file or search a product by model, code or any part of product description. The extension will create the desired product in a second, all you need is to define the price and publish the product.
The catalog is free for now and provides full & valid information for the selected products which supplied by manufacturer or was taken from the manufacturer’s data. We will increase the number of categories and products on demand. The stability and usability will be improved based on our customers feedback.
Stay tuned to receive the latest news and help to improve the extension!

Watch the extension in action:
sections.installation:
1. Upload the contents of .zip file to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Follow video instructions on the plugin page.
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes, our plugin is totally FREE for now.

Will you add more categories & products?

Yes, for sure, we will add more of them later.

Where can I find docs and other instructions?

https://wiki.centedi.com/
sections.changelog:
Version 0.0.9 – Released: February 28, 2022

  • Client-side communication logic has been moved to server-side
  • Requests have been optimized and became more secured through the new encryption mechanism
  • Images (product, group, brand etc.) moved to dynamic conversion, by using API methods, which gives more flexibility
  • Fixed image duplication bug inside Woocommerce media library during the product import process
  • Small bugfixes, additional tuning & optimizations
  • Updated translations

Version 0.0.8 – Released: September 15, 2021

  • Additional tuning
  • Added possibility to display variations as single products & hide their parent product as well
  • Updated translations

= Version 0.0.7 – Released: April 19, 2021
* Added initial support for XML sitemaps
* Added image conversion: you can now select in which format your images will be saved (webp/jpg/png etc)
* Various fixes & additional features for brands, filters etc
* Updated translations

Version 0.0.6-beta – Released: August 20, 2020

  • Various fixes & additional features for brands, filters etc
  • Added possibility to re-arrange brands order ( affects brands slider )
  • Added possibility to hide brands ( affects brands slider )
  • Updated for the latest WordPress & Woocommerce versions
  • Updated translations

Version 0.0.5-beta – Released: July 09, 2020

  • Various fixes & additional features for brands, filters etc
  • Additional settings for CentEDI plugin
  • Possibility to choose filterable attribute for each category
  • Updated translations

Version 0.0.4-beta – Released: June 09, 2020

  • Various fixes
  • Filters now work with all attributes
  • Filters are dynamically rebuilding now according to found products
  • Filters can display count of suitable products
  • Updated translations

Version 0.0.3-beta – Released: May 28, 2020

  • Various fixes
  • Added config section for the plugin (in the Woocommerce settings)
  • Added brands support & configurable brands slider (more options later)
  • Added product brand/category/attributes filter widget (more options later)

Version 0.0.2-beta – Released: Apr 02, 2020

  • Performance, search & stability updates
  • Added tooltips to the product properties on frontend
  • Added variation images
  • Added product attachments tab & functionality

Version 0.0.1-beta – Released: Mar 09, 2020

  • Initial Beta version release
